zh.name: 九号电动A2z
zh.description: 电池挺大的，25-26AH的锂电池，骑个80-90公里没问题。最主要是有智能系统，手机APP可以远程控制，还能实时查看车在哪，挺方便的。

zh.name: 绿源小果粒
zh.description: 性价比还不错，400W的电机配上48V的电池，骑个45公里左右没问题。用的是钢丝真空胎，前后都是陶瓷刹车，安全性有保障。

zh.name: 爱玛小坦克
zh.description: 这款是入门级的，价格实惠，骑个40公里没问题。如果就是学校和周边转转的话，完全够用了。

zh.name: 爱玛A500
zh.description: 这个电池容量很给力，充满电能骑150公里，而且支持快充，充一小时能充到80%，特别适合经常跑长途的同学。

zh.name: 雅迪DT6
zh.description: 配置还不错，400W电机搭配48V24Ah锂电池，前面是碟刹后面是鼓刹。LED大灯挺亮的，晚上骑也很安全。

zh.name: 雅迪DT3
zh.description: 用的是石墨烯锂电池，寿命特别长，厂家直接给5年质保。前后都有减震，骑起来特别舒服，减震效果真的不错。

zh.name: 雅迪欧曼2.0
zh.description: 这款是升级版，LED灯又亮又好看，还带防盗系统，晚上骑车特别有安全感。续航能力不错，特别适合住得远的同学。

zh.name: 台铃标兵
zh.description: 电机功率很大，1200W的，速度杠杠的，最快能到50。刹车系统很靠谱，前碟后鼓的配置。实测能骑70-80公里，挺够用的。

zh.name: 小牛UQis/UQi
zh.description: 可以用手机APP控制，挺智能的。UQis是简配版，少了转向灯，车身小了点，不过踏板改进了。想后期改装的话建议直接买UQi版本。

zh.name: 台铃赤兔超智版
zh.description: 动力很足，1000W的电机，速度能到51。刹车也很稳，前碟后鼓的。有USB充电口，手机没电了随时能充。还能用APP定位开锁，挺方便的。

zh.name: 小牛F100
zh.description: 入门款里性价比不错的，400W电机够用，电池可以拆下来充电。官方说能骑50公里，实际上40公里左右吧。

zh.name: 新日CiCi
zh.description: 颜值真的很高，特别适合女生骑。速度对校园来说刚刚好，而且整体设计特别贴合女生身材，很多女生都说骑着特别舒服。

en.name: Ninebot A2z
en.description: Large 25-26AH lithium battery with 80-90km range. Features smart system with mobile app for remote control and real-time location tracking.

en.name: Luyuan Xiaoguo Li
en.description: Good value for money with 400W motor and 48V battery. Features wire vacuum tires and ceramic brakes for enhanced safety.

en.name: Aima Mini Tank
en.description: Entry-level model with affordable price and 40km range. Perfect for campus and nearby area commuting.

en.name: Aima A500
en.description: Impressive battery capacity with 150km range. Features fast charging - 80% in one hour. Ideal for long-distance riders.

en.name: Yadea DT6
en.description: 400W motor with 48V24Ah lithium battery. Disc front brake and drum rear brake. Bright LED lights for night safety.

en.name: Yadea DT3
en.description: Graphene lithium battery with 5-year warranty. Front and rear suspension for comfortable riding experience.

en.name: Yadea Oman 2.0
en.description: Upgraded version with bright LED lights and anti-theft system. Good range, perfect for students living far from campus.

en.name: Tailg Bing
en.description: Powerful 1200W motor with max speed of 50km/h. Reliable braking system with front disc and rear drum brakes. Tested range of 70-80km.

en.name: NIU UQis/UQi
en.description: Smart app control features. UQis is basic version without turn signals but improved footboard. Recommend UQi for future modifications.

en.name: Tailg Chitu Smart
en.description: Strong 1000W motor reaching 51km/h. Stable braking system. USB charging port and app-based location tracking and unlocking.

en.name: NIU F100
en.description: Good value entry-level model with 400W motor and removable battery. Real range around 40km despite official 50km claim.

en.name: Xinri CiCi
en.description: Stylish design perfect for female riders. Campus-friendly speed and ergonomic design specifically tailored for women's comfort.
